The Civic Analytics Degree 🏫

Sep 26, 2019

  • civictech
  • episode
  • civic analytics
  • academics
  • education

We are joined by Dr. Stephen Kleinschmit, Director of a new Civic Analytics Masters program at the University of Illinois at Chicago. We’ll talk about how this program came to be, it’s relationship with civic tech, and explore what makes it tick.
